title: Download Turn Around (5,4,3,2,1)
text:
Download Turn Around (5,4,3,2,1)
First 10:)
by RedSoxOwnYanks34
Flo Rida has become a standard in club hits. The guy can do no wrong. This song is sure to be no exception. One reviewer said it "sounds like everyone else." But if that's true, why isn't EVERYONE else on the top of the charts every year. Flo Rida's obviously doin' something right. A reviewer also said Flo Rida is best when "sampling other songs from other people." So...basically we want the guy to produce countless ripoffs of other hit songs just to boost his sales? Naw people...music is about making your own unique dent in the ears of the listeners. This is good because it IS different than most songs on the radio today. Not because of the beat and style, but because he gets the job done, making a hit that doesn't need an "Explicit" tag posted on it. What you hear here, is what you'll hear on the radio. Plain and simple. Respect, my Florida friend ;)
